description:
At the law firm of Grimes Teich Anderson in Asheville, North Carolina, we provide unmatched advocacy and support to clients who suffered an injury or lost a loved one as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing. With eight total law offices across the Carolinas, we have become one of the region's premier personal injury law firms. We also offer exceptional representation in all areas of employment law as well as workers' compensation, veterans benefits and Social Security Disability.

Backed by our decades of combined legal experience, our attorneys possess the extensive skills and resources necessary to handle your matter efficiently and to increase your chances of obtaining the full amount of compensation and restitution you deserve. We have on our staff attorneys who are board certified in workers' compensation law, and all of our legal professionals maintain active involvement in various professional legal organizations. Therefore, you can trust you will receive the most relevant, up-to-date counsel regarding your matter.

Honored for our success, our attorneys have earned numerous top rankings from our peers, including AV Preeminent peer-review ratings* through Martindale-Hubbell, recognition from Best Lawyers and Top 100 Trial Lawyers designations from the National Trial Lawyers. We have also received Superb client ratings on Avvo, and we are members of the Million Dollar Advocates Forum as the result of the substantial settlements and awards we have secured for our plaintiff clients.

To find out more about how Grimes Teich Anderson can best serve your needs and help you through this difficult and uncertain time in your life, you can call our law office or visit our website to schedule a free initial consultation.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.

Best Lawyers® and The Best Lawyers in America© are registered trademarks of BL Rankings, LLC d/b/a Best Lawyers and Co., LLC. The names, logo, and database are protected under the trademark, copyright, and fair use laws of the United States of America.
